content:
Posting here for visibility:

I'm trying to import a Slack export into Zulip but when I try to run the import command after the data is converted, I get a message that the subdomain is unavailable, and adding the --allow-reserved-subdomain option does not do anything.

zulip@zulip-ubuntu-8gb-hel1-new:~/deployments/current$ ./manage.py import --allow-reserved-subdomain '' /tmp/converted_slack_data
Subdomain unavailable. Please choose a different one.
Pass --allow-reserved-subdomain to override subdomain restrictions.

Please advise. Thanks!
Replied; there's some error handling to improve here to prevent further folks being confused the same way this user was.
